expense.desc: Add a new expense corresponding to this shopping list.

settings.title: Settings
settings.introText: Move on with your tutorial of click 'End tutorial' at the bottom.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.exp: Vanilla or chocolate? That's a question every worthy soldier has to answer for themselves. Just be careful: The blinding light might daze you.

lang.title: Language
lang.exp: We currently support English and German. If you want to help us translate Jeff into your you're very welcome to do so. Just contact us!

locale.title: Locale
locale.exp: The locale settings affect the way dates, times, and currencies are displayed.
locale.customHint: A locale can include a language only (like en) or a specific country (like en-US)
locale.desc: Note that the currency setting only changes the symbol used for displaying money amounts. No conversion is applied. If your household is an international conglomerate, we apologize for the inconvenience caused by this inadequacy.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.exp: Notifications remind you of important upcoming tasks.
controller: Your system does not support push notifications.
The permission to send push notifications was denied on your system. Please check your website settings and allow them if you want to use this feature.

intro.title: Restart Introduction
intro.exp: If you missed something in my introduction just restart it right here.

clock.title: Clock Widget
clock.exp: A revolutionary time-telling device. Follows the laws of special and general relativity.
clock.noteText: The clock widget displays time according to your

weather.title: Weather Widget
weather.exp: Provides you with the latest weather data using the free
weather.exp2: Please sign up for an API key at
weather.exp3: or freeload one from your roommates.

tasks.title: Tasks Widget
tasks.exp: This widget makes sure things are getting done in your home. No one ever dared to question its authority.

finances.title: Finances Widget
finances.exp: Never lose track of your household expenses so not a single penny will go missing.

disturb.title: Do Not Disturb Widget
disturb.exp: You want to study or just be left alone for a while? When you activate this widget you can see if somebody dont want to be disturbed. Just activate the do not disturb mode with click of a button right from the widget.

home.title: Home Widget
home.exp: You want to let everybody know that you're home? Just hit the bell in the widget and everybody will be notified.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.exp: Keep track of your shared activites and duties using the Google Calendar API. If enabled, the calendar can be reached via the new link in your navigation drawer.

hue.title: Philipps Hue
hue.exp: Coming soon (or maybe not so soon).
